price: He said, “I will ask my Lord to forgive you, for He is the All-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.”
arabic: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
